name: Plugextra
body:
Add this address to your bookmarks: [PlugExtra](javascript:(function(){var a=document.createElement('script');a.setAttribute('id','plugextra-js');document.body.appendChild(a);a.setAttribute('src','https://raw.github.com/TeeheeLP/PlugExtra/master/plugextra.js');}());)

Click it in a plug.dj room to start PlugExtra. Current features: * Automatic woot or waitlist join. Can be turned off. * Shows a log of playing tracks and their votes and curates. The log can be hidden.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
